name: match
description: Switch-like conditional operation that checks the same field against multiple values. Similar to switch in many programming languages. Enables if-then-else constructs for event streams.
syntax: | field match { value1 => action1 ; value2 => action2 ; }

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field to match against different values

parameters.name: cases
parameters.description: Value-action pairs where each value is matched against the field

notes: Can be destructive (modifying existing fields) or non-destructive (creating new fields with _ prefix). All conditions check the same field, unlike case which can check different conditions.
